heroDescription: We provide top-level accounting services for freelancers, companies, and small businesses. Our expert team supports you every step of the way.
messageMinLength: The message must be at least 10 characters
aboutParagraph1: The accounting firm specializes in providing accounting services to small and medium-sized businesses, freelancers, and companies. The firm emphasizes personal attention, professionalism, and reliability while guiding clients every step of the way.
aboutParagraph2: With over 3 years of experience, the firmâ€™s team provides comprehensive services including bookkeeping, annual reports, capital declarations, tax consulting, and more.
aboutParagraph3: The firm is committed to providing professional and personalized service, tailored to each client's needs, with the goal of helping businesses succeed and grow.
faqQuestion1: What is a capital declaration and why is it important?
faqAnswer1: A capital declaration is a document where you report all your assets and liabilities. It allows tax authorities to verify that your income matches your capital.
faqQuestion2: When should I submit an annual report?
faqAnswer2: Self-employed individuals and company owners must submit an annual report by April 30 each year. Check for regulation updates.
faqQuestion3: Can I file reports myself or do I need an accountant?
faqAnswer3: You can file independently, but it's recommended to consult an accountant to ensure compliance and take advantage of tax benefits.
faqQuestion4: How do I register as a licensed dealer?
faqAnswer4: You register with Tax Authority, National Insurance, and VAT. We offer full guidance throughout the process.

services.title: Bookkeeping
services.desc: Ongoing and accurate bookkeeping for small and medium-sized businesses, including monthly and annual reports.

services.title: Annual Reports
services.desc: Preparation and submission of annual reports to tax authorities according to updated regulations.

services.title: Capital Declaration
services.desc: Assistance in preparing and submitting a capital declaration, including review and consultation before submission.

services.title: Tax Consulting
services.desc: Professional and personalized tax consulting for freelancers, companies, and individuals to plan taxes efficiently.

services.title: Representation Before Authorities
services.desc: Representation before tax authorities and National Insurance for inquiries, assessments, and appeals.

services.title: Opening Business Files
services.desc: Guidance in opening files at tax authorities and instruction on how to manage as a new business legally.

services.title: Capital Gains Tax
services.desc: Advice and guidance in real estate taxation, including capital gains tax calculations and planning.

services.title: Real Estate Taxation
services.desc: Providing tax advisory services in the real estate sector, including residential and commercial property taxation.
